function EP02_11()

    --.承-5【4月第4週】「必罰」
    SaveData.Title = "必罰"

    --//BG：男子部教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",0)

    --//BU：オウガ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0076.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "So, Erika was asleep until after school, huh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0280.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-yeah... The knights took care of me in the nurse's office, so it wasn't serious, though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0077.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "I'd say it was serious enough... Or rather, it's a crime. Aren't those so-called princess knights going to be punished?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0281.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Because they're 'princesses.' Besides, if you overlook their fondness for sexual harassment, they're reliable, kind, cool, and truly wonderful people. I can understand why so many admire them." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0282.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "According to Hiyu-san, they might prank you but don’t go all the way... or so I've heard. Just rumors though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0078.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Hmph, what shameless females. Looks like I have to set things straight! The morals of this academy! And its sense of beauty!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0079.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Haaa—hahaha! I can’t wait for the day those females kneel before my physique!" ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga stood up, opened his shirt, and as usual, started taking selfies. ]])

    MSG([[ This is quite a strange sight... isn’t it? I’m scared of myself for having gotten so used to it that it feels normal. ]])

    MSG([[ Cross-dressing, this prestigious girls’ school. Ultra-beautiful girls called 'princesses.' And an escape scene while drugged with sleeping pills. ]])

    MSG([[ These past few weeks have been packed with extraordinary experiences, and I’ve developed quite the tolerance. ]])

    MSG([[ Now, I feel like I can stay calm no matter what weird people show up. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0283.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Speaking of which, today the seniors’ suspensions end, right? We brought presents, but they haven’t shown up yet." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0080.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Hmm, that’s true. Well, considering they’re the kind to cause sexual harassment incidents, I don’t expect them to show up on time." ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    STOP_BGM(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "That’s an unacceptable thing to say." ]])
    --//1号

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0284.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I heard a voice behind me and turned around. Three men were suddenly in the classroom. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing those men, I was at a loss for words. Ouga also tensed up cautiously. And understandably so. ]])

    MSG([[ Because— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015be")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,75,75)
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-300,150)
    --//BU：1号（通常）、2号（通常）、3号（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA301aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA201aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MA101aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",300,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM04.wav",0)

    MSG([[ All of those men were wearing strange masks. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "You don’t have to be so on edge." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "That’s right. We are the seniors you were just talking about." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "...We’ve all been attending this academy since last year... hehehe." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0285.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ha, hahaha..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ A weird laugh slipped out. W-what is with these guys...? I thought I was used to the unusual, but I take that back. ]])

    MSG([[ There are still degenerates in this world who exceed my imagination. ...I didn’t want to know that. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ba")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA301aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA201aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MA101aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,850,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-50,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0081.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "How did you manage to go outside dressed like that? Learn some shame." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0286.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Well, being half-naked isn’t exactly normal either." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ But the fact that Ouga in half-naked looks normal compared to the seniors just shows how abnormal they are. ]])

    MSG([[ The seniors showed no sign of being fazed by Ouga’s words and began to speak. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Don’t get the wrong impression. There are deep reasons for dressing in such bizarre outfits." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "You should know about the darkness of this academy that we witnessed firsthand." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0082.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "You say we should know the darkness? What do you mean?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0287.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What exactly is this darkness of the academy?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I blurted it out without thinking. Maybe it’s a topic related to my sister. ]])

    MSG([[ Come to think of it, normal people wouldn’t wear such strange masks daily. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely these seniors must have gotten caught up in some terrifying situation. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Calm down, Minato-dono. Due to certain circumstances, we have abandoned our faces and names..." ]])

    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,400,50,100,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(100)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,400,0,100,Ease.InCubic)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Call me ‘Skill Senpai #1,’ who likes physical punishment." ]])

    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-50,50,100,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(100)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-50,0,100,Ease.InCubic)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "I am ‘Words Senpai #2,’ who enjoys being scolded." ]])

    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,850,50,100,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(100)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,850,0,100,Ease.InCubic)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "...‘Senpai #3’ with twenty-six special fetishes, kehehe." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What is this academy’s darkness!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I ignored their introductions full of points to question. ]])

    MSG([[ The seniors finally solemnly began relating the darkness they experienced. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "You won’t believe it, but this academy—!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Th-this academy...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Does not have school swimsuits." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "We sneaked into pool class to see young ladies in school swimsuits. But what we saw was a variety of swimsuits!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "It’d be great if the girls were forced to wear the same dorky swimsuits... they just don’t get it... keh." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "It’s fine that uniforms and swimsuits are free to modify, but they should know the beauty of unity! This is the darkness we glimpsed in this academy!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "Don’t sneak into pool class looking for romance like us, you’ll regret it." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "Though gym clothes are standard... kehehe." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "............" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0083.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "............" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hello? Police? Yes, some perverts have appeared." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_MA101ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "W-w-wait!!! Please don’t report us with such a fluid motion!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ Without realizing it, I had started calling the police, but the senior grabbed my phone and ended the call. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m surprised by how cold and indifferent I feel. I didn’t know I could be so detached from others. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Was the reason you were suspended because of that peeping incident? If so, you had it coming." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "How rude. Don’t look down on us!" ]])

    MSG([[ The seniors retorted indignantly. Though I can’t see their faces, their tone is very serious. ]])

    MSG([[ That’s somewhat reassuring. They weren’t suspended for peeping, but for a proper (?) reason, right? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "The suspension started when we got caught sneaking into the New Year’s karuta tournament and all our other offenses were exposed." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_MA201aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "Those in furisode kimono were truly beautiful. If getting suspended for seeing that, then I’m satisfied." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MA301aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "I got so excited by their beauty... that I got caught..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Oh, so that’s what happened." ]])
    LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0294.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hello? Police? Yes, perverts. Please come quickly." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_MA101ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "W-w-wait!!?!!?" ]])

    MSG([[ The senior quickly snatched the phone I borrowed from Ouga. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I’m sure now. These seniors are enemies of the girls. Marika-neesan was wise to suspend them. ]])

    MSG([[ Somehow I feel silly for having been so emotionally drained by this matter, but at least I feel relieved. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0295.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I get that you seniors are perverts. But you’ve reflected on it now, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0296.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I’m sorry to the girls’ division, but if you don’t sexually harass anymore, I won’t say anything." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MA101aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Thank you, Minato-dono. You’re so kind." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA201aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-50,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "Not only in appearance but in personality, you’re an angel." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MA301aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,850,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "Minato-kyun... kehehe..." ]])

    MSG([[ I feel like a weird reply was mixed in, but I’ll let it slide. The conversation isn’t moving forward. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0084.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "So what’s the real reason you guys wear those bizarre masks? I guess it’s the Girls Division’s order, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "...Sharp as always, Ouga-dono. You’re right. We were ordered to wear these masks during our suspension." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0297.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "You... you had to wear masks?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ So Marika-neesan ordered it? My heart quickened at the unexpected development. ]])

    MSG([[ I wonder what purpose she had for making them wear masks. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "We’re all children of major corporations. We’ve grown up greatly benefiting from our faces and names. Even after entering this academy, we were arrogant." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "At that time, the Princess Emperor... Marika Ikusa-sama scolded us like this." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "‘You are too obsessed with appearances. During your suspension, live hiding your face and name.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "And then we... woke up..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "What’s important... is what’s inside you." ]])

    MSG([[ That sounded a lot like something Ouga said once. Marika-neesan didn’t just suspend them; she led them to reform. ]])

    MSG([[ Come to think of it, making them wear masks is an outrageous method, but it’s so like her. ]])

    MSG([[ I laugh at myself for having been so on edge. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "So, juniors, we look forward to working with you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "Not to brag, but we failed almost all our first-year classes. In terms of credits needed, we’re still at your level." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "We’re basically always together... kehehe." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0085.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "That’s truly not something to be proud of." ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga decisively cuts them down. I’m glad Ouga is here. This academy is too much for me alone to keep up with. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0298.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Huh? I understand the situation, but since your suspension ended, can’t you take off the masks?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Oh? Do we still have a reason to wear them now?" ]])

    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,850,50,200,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-50,50,200,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,400,50,200,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,850,0,100,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-50,0,100,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,400,0,100,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(100)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0001")
    MSG([[
    【Seniors】
 "Because it’s a hobby (is) (is) (is)." ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga and I looked at each other and slowly nodded, deciding not to comment. ]])

    MSG([[ And so, my school life gained some strange classmates—no, three of them. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")

    --　　　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP02_12")

end
